file.original: Items and Production Structures for Multilevel Products.htm

external-file.href: Items and Production Structures for Multilevel Products.htm.skl

trans-unit.source: Items and Production Structures for Multilevel Products

seg-source.mrk: Items and Production Structures for Multilevel Products

trans-unit.source: Items and Production Structures can be created for multilevel products in a Document/Construction BOM using the “Create Item & Production Structure” function as well.

seg-source.mrk: Items and Production Structures can be created for multilevel products in a Document/Construction BOM using the “Create Item & Production Structure” function as well.

trans-unit.source: The difference from the sales document/Construction Order header creation is that the new Item and Production Structure are created from a line in the Document/Construction BOM. The new Item and Production Structure are based on this line, not the entire BOM.

seg-source.mrk: The difference from the sales document/Construction Order header creation is that the new Item and Production Structure are created from a line in the Document/Construction BOM.
The new Item and Production Structure are based on this line, not the entire BOM.

trans-unit.source: Example – Create Item and Production Structure from Document BOM

seg-source.mrk: Example – Create Item and Production Structure from Document BOM

trans-unit.source: This example uses the same item as in the example in topic <MadCap:xref href="Items and Production Structures from Configurations.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Items and Production Structures from Configurations” on page 1</MadCap:xref>. However, the customer has asked for a change to the pearl green pigment so additional chemicals are added in the Document BOM. This new configuration is created as a new item and needs to be properly defined in the Production Structure.

seg-source.mrk: This example uses the same item as in the example in topic <MadCap:xref href="Items and Production Structures from Configurations.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Items and Production Structures from Configurations” on page 1</MadCap:xref>.
However, the customer has asked for a change to the pearl green pigment so additional chemicals are added in the Document BOM.
This new configuration is created as a new item and needs to be properly defined in the Production Structure.

trans-unit.source: : Checklist with measurements and selected color

seg-source.mrk: : Checklist with measurements and selected color

trans-unit.source: In the Document BOM, the quantity per is calculated for the measurement and selected color.

seg-source.mrk: In the Document BOM, the quantity per is calculated for the measurement and selected color.

trans-unit.source: : Document BOM with measurements and selected color

seg-source.mrk: : Document BOM with measurements and selected color

trans-unit.source: The new chemicals are added below item P-30106, thus creating the Sub BOM. Additionally, the item description is changed to be generic.

seg-source.mrk: The new chemicals are added below item P-30106, thus creating the Sub BOM.
Additionally, the item description is changed to be generic.

trans-unit.source: : Document BOM with new Sub BOM added below item P-30106

seg-source.mrk: : Document BOM with new Sub BOM added below item P-30106

trans-unit.source: With the line selected, click Actions > Create Item & Prod. Structure.

seg-source.mrk: With the line selected, click <span class="Bold">Actions > Create Item & Prod.
Structure.

trans-unit.source: : Preparing to create item and production structure for special color in Document BOM

seg-source.mrk: : Preparing to create item and production structure for special color in Document BOM

trans-unit.source: A message appears asking to keep the values for the Share of Recipe. Click Yes to transfer the shares to the Production Structure.

seg-source.mrk: A message appears asking to keep the values for the Share of Recipe.
Click Yes to transfer the shares to the Production Structure.

trans-unit.source: : Message to keep Share of Recipe values for transfer to Production Structure

seg-source.mrk: : Message to keep Share of Recipe values for transfer to Production Structure

trans-unit.source: Another message may appear about density changes. Click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Another message may appear about density changes.
Click OK.

trans-unit.source: After the process runs, a confirmation message appears with the new Item and Production Structure numbers. Click Yes to open the Production Structure.

seg-source.mrk: After the process runs, a confirmation message appears with the new Item and Production Structure numbers.
Click Yes to open the Production Structure.

trans-unit.source: : Confirmation message from Item and Production Structure creation

seg-source.mrk: : Confirmation message from Item and Production Structure creation

trans-unit.source: The Production Structure has been created for the new item with the calculated shares of the components, and the new description.

seg-source.mrk: The Production Structure has been created for the new item with the calculated shares of the components, and the new description.

trans-unit.source: : Production Structure for new configured item

seg-source.mrk: : Production Structure for new configured item

trans-unit.source: The Design department will now check the Production Structure or add any further specifications before certifying the Production Structure and creating the Routing and Production BOM.

seg-source.mrk: The Design department will now check the Production Structure or add any further specifications before certifying the Production Structure and creating the Routing and Production BOM.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Production Structure.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Production Structure.

trans-unit.source: In the Document BOM line, the item has been replaced with the new configured item.

seg-source.mrk: In the Document BOM line, the item has been replaced with the new configured item.

trans-unit.source: : Document BOM line with new item

seg-source.mrk: : Document BOM line with new item

trans-unit.source: When the “Create Item & Prod. Structure” function is run for the Sales Order line, the new item in the Document BOM will be used in the new Production Structure.

seg-source.mrk: When the “Create Item & Prod.
Structure” function is run for the Sales Order line, the new item in the Document BOM will be used in the new Production Structure.

trans-unit.source: Item and Production Structure from Construction BOM

seg-source.mrk: Item and Production Structure from Construction BOM

trans-unit.source: The same process is used for creating an Item and Production Structure from a Construction BOM line, as long as a reservation to the Construction Header does not exist.

seg-source.mrk: The same process is used for creating an Item and Production Structure from a Construction BOM line, as long as a reservation to the Construction Header does not exist.

trans-unit.source: : Create Item & Prod. Structure function in the Construction BOM

seg-source.mrk: : Create Item & Prod.
Structure function in the Construction BOM
